term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - background of a radiation measuring device
term.title: background

item.text: The term employed to designate the value indicated by a radiation measuring device in the absence of the source whose radiation is to be measured, when the device is placed under its normal conditions of operation.

sources.item: PAC, 1982, 54, 1533. 'Glossary of terms used in nuclear analytical chemistry (Provisional)' on page 1536 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac198254081533)
